choices: Josh downloads the app for you
1.content:
One day you’re casually looking for new apps on your phone when you stumble upon one called Swap Me; now as the TG fan that you are you instantly think of body swapping. But you knew something like that couldn’t be real, but you click on it anyway.

You skim over the page, the sample images seemed to be of a contacts list, and a day planner. You notice that the app has received a 4 out of 5 star review so you begin to wonder what it really is. Was it some kind of social planning thing organizer? So you then decide to read the description.

“Every wondered what it was like to see the world though someone else’s eyes? Well look no further; this is the first body swapping app, where you can temporarily trade bodies with your friends and family.” It said

Just then you receive a call from your friend Josh, “Oh hey man what’s up?” you say, “Hey man what you doing?” he says, “Nothing much, bored, looking up phone apps when you called.” You say, “Nice, wanna come chill at my place?” he asks “Sure, I’ll be right over.” You say

You walk over to Josh’s apartment still thinking about the Swap Me app, was such a thing really possible?

You arrive at Josh’s place and he welcomes you in. The two of you then proceed to the living room where he sits down in the recliner and you kick back on the couch.

“So what’s new with you?” you asks, “Nothing at all, the one day I’m not working and there is nothing good on TV.” He says laughing, “So what about you?” he asks, “Well you know me, no work, so every day is boring, but I did find an interesting app just now.” You say

“Nice, what you got?” he asks, “Well it’s called Swap Me, and it says it lets you swap bodies with people.” You say

“Swap bodies?” he says looking at you like you must be joking, “Yeah you know when you swap brains or souls or bodies or however they do it in the movies?” you say, “Yeah I know what it means, I just don’t get what’s the big deal about it.” He says laughing

“Oh come on you’re saying you wouldn’t want to be someone else for a little while?” you ask, “Nope, I’m perfectly happy right here.” He says smiling, “Oh really? You called me over because you were bored.” You say laughing, “Yeah so, just because I’m bored doesn’t mean id want to be someone else” he says laughing

“Well think about it, you know your neighbor Rick’s girlfriend, the one that sunbathes topless on their back porch? You can tell me you wouldn’t mind being Rick for a few hours.” You say laughing, josh smiles at the thought but then says, “Okay you’ve got me there but what if you end up in a less desirable situation? Like what about Jackie from the third floor that’s pregnant with triplets?” Josh says laughing

“Ah well you have a point, then again not knowing is half the fun, and it would only be temporary. Right?’ you say, “Okay well if that’s the case have you downloaded this app yet?” he asks, “Ah no not yet” you say, “Well what’s the hold up?” he says, “I’m thinking about it.” You say
1.title: Browsing for Apps

11.content:
“Well let me see it,” he says. You then pull up the app and hand him your phone, “Let’s see,” he says reading over the app and pressing the download and accept conditions button, he then smiles as it begins downloading.

“It says here that once downloaded this app will send a message to everyone on your contacts list that has a Smartphone to establish your own personal swap network. And as the person that initiated the swap it will be up to them to decide when they would like to swap with you, and their reservations will show up on this calendar so that you know when a swap will occur.” He says with a growing smile

You were confused, the description that you read didn’t have all that information on it, “Hey how did you know all that?” you asks, “Well simple, I downloaded the app and signed you up.” He says laughing, “You did what?!” you exclaim, “Calm down, now we will get to see if this is for real or not.” He says laughing

You quickly look at your phone and see the blank calendar, “Oh good nothing happened, what did you do that for?” you ask, “Well you said you liked body swapping but you were too chicken to do it so I did it for you.” He says

You didn’t know what to say it was true that you were interested in swapping bodies but you didn’t know about doing it for real.

Suddenly your phone starts beeping.
11.title: Josh downloads the app for you

choices: The Nurse says we're ready for you
Jackie Calls you from your body
111.content:
Suddenly your phone rings, looking at the caller ID you see that its Jackie, an old friend of yours from high school.

Relieved to see that it nothing to do with the app you answer it, “Oh hey Jackie, what’s up?” you say, “Hey Aaron, so what’s that message all about?” she ask, a chill runs down your spine and you give Josh the evil eye. “Oh yeah that’s nothing don’t worry about it, Josh had my phone.” You say

“Oh okay, I didn’t know what to make of it, something about you wanting to swap bodies.” She says, “Yeah I’m sorry about that, I found a weird app that said it could swap peoples bodies and josh downloaded it onto my phone. Oh no, I wonder how many people got the same message you did.” You say with an embarrassment sigh.

“Wow that’s gonna take some explaining.” Jackie says laughing which was interrupted moments later with a sign of discomfort. “Hey are you okay?” you ask, “Well not really, my tooth is killing me, I’m waiting at the dentist office now.” She says

“Oh no that’s horrible.” You say with concern, “Yea I know, and I’ve already been here over an hour, and I haven’t been able to eat anything good in days.” She says, “Well at least it won’t be much longer right?” you say, “I hope so, but at this point I wish that thing u sent me was real, I would do anything for a piece of pizza right now.” She said

“Oh man that does sound good,” you say smiling, “Hey Josh you hungry?” you ask him, “Oh ha ha very funny.” She says, “Sorry, I’m hungry too.” You say, “Hey how bout when you get done we can all meet up and get something to eat?” you suggest, “Oh okay, I’ll call you after I get out.” She says, “Okay later.” You say hanging up the phone.

“So what’s wrong with Jackie?” Josh asks, “Toothache, at dentist now, starving, told her we would meet up with her after.” You say, “Nice,” he says, he then cringe from an unpleasant thought, “I hate going to the dentist.” He says, “Yeah me neither.” You say agreeing with him, “I mean I don’t know if it’s cause it’s a doctor’s office or what but there is something unsettling about it.” You say, “Oh yeah, I remember when I to get a tooth filled and even though they numbed my mouth I could still feel the drill and…” he says till you interrupt him, “Wow hey! Enough with the mental images, you keep that up and I won’t me hungry anymore.” You say

The next thing you know you were sitting in a doctor’s office, at first you didn’t know what to think, one moment you were you were at Josh’s place then you blinked and you were in the waiting room of what looked like a dentist’s office. And suddenly it all made since as you feel a throbbing pain in your jaw. You then rush to the bathroom to confirm your fears, you were now Jackie!
111.title: You're recieving a phone call

1111.content:
You stare into the mirror while holding your jaw to relieve the pain, you didn’t know what to think, obviously the app worked but now you were in Jackie’s body dealing with her toothache.

Suddenly you hear a nurse knocking on the bathroom door saying, “Miss Watson, you can come back now.”

Your heart begins to race as you walk out of the bathroom, as you follow the nurse all you could think about was Josh’s story about when he had to get a tooth filled. And you didn’t even know what was wrong with Jackie’s too but was defiantly going to be more than a regular checkup. Once in the back room the nurse asks you to have a seat in the chair, you hesitantly sit down. “Okay now what seems to be the trouble?” she ask, “It hurts.” You say, honestly not knowing what was wrong with your current body.

“Well let me have a look, now says ah.” She says pulling out a small flashlight; you open your mouth as wide as you can, or at least wide enough considering the pain. “Oh my looks like you have cracked a tooth,” she says, “I what?” you ask as I chill does down your spine, “Oh don’t worry it’s just a small crack, we can take care of that no problem.” She says

The nurse leaves the room to do get the dentist, and you quickly reach for your phone to call Jackie. “Hey?” you hear your own voice say, “What did you do!?” you say trying to keep your voice down, “Hey calm down, I’m just as freaked out about all this as you are.” She says, “Wanna bet, the nurse just looked at your mouth and you cracked one of your teeth!” you exclaim, “Oh wow! I didn’t think it was that serious.” She says, “Well it is and now she is going to go get the dentist.” You say, “Wait so they can fix it just like that?” she asks, “Apparently, so quick swap us back before they get back.” You say desperately.

“Well your phone just has my name on a calendar from 2pm to 3pm, what does mine say?” she says, you find she app on her phone and see a timer counting down, 45min to go. “All I’ve got is a countdown.” You say in frustration, “Well I guess we can’t switch back till the countdown is over.” She says, you can hear someone coming down the hall, “You’ve got to be kidding me,” you say, “Hang in there me and josh will read more about this and get back to you, later.” She says hanging up the phone.

Just then the dentist and nurse enter the room, “Alright Miss Watson if you’ll lay back for me we can get this taken care of for you.” He says smiling, you then slowly lay back and close your eyes as the doctor sedate you for the procedure.

After it was all over you walk out of the office trying not to think about what had just happened, not only did you have to get dental work done but you did it for someone else. You then get in Jackie’s car and drive to Josh’s place with 10mins left on the countdown. You knock on the door and find your body opening it to let you in.
1111.title: The Nurse says we're ready for you

11111.content:
Without a word you enter the apartment, Jackie and josh were silent, simply watching you wondering if it was really you in there.

You sit down on the couch and let out a deep sigh, “So… how are you?’ Josh says, “Well today I got my first filling, but does it really count as mine if it’s someone else’s mouth?” you ask, “Aaron I am so sorry, really I didn’t think it would actually work.” She says

“It’s okay Jackie, none of us thought it was real, but apparently it is.” You say, “So how was your first body swap experience?” Josh says smiling, “Well it could have been better.” You say smiling

Suddenly you find yourself looking at Jackie, “Wow I guess time must have ran out.” Jackie says from her body, “Ah my jaw is still a little numb, but it beats throbbing pain.” She says smiling

“You’re welcome.” You say smiling, “But hey I’m not hungry anymore.” You say, “Yeah we decided to go ahead and order pizza, don’t worry we saved you or well me some.” she says walking to the kitchen since her body hadn’t eaten yet.

“Okay so what else did yall find out about the app now that we know its legit?” you ask, “Well I guess you could say it’s like a facebook friend request, one person sends it to another and then the other must decide whether or not to accept it; At which point the pick when the exchange will occur and for how long.” Josh says, “Wait so I don’t get a say in it?” you ask, “Well the first time you don’t, part of setting up the swap network they were talking about is the initial swap. So now yall can swap again but you both have to agree on when and how long.” Josh says, “Okay but who else got the message?” you ask, “Well I owe you an apology for that one, you see when you download it a list of your eligible contacts pops up and your suppose to be able to sort through it but I didn’t so everyone that could get it just did.” Josh says, “But don’t worry, I’m sure the majority of people will just ignore it.” He says laughing
11111.title: Continue

info.brief_description: A Smartphone app allows you friends to borrow your body at will
info.description:
In this story you come across a new Smartphone app called Swap Me, designed to allow a person to formally tell anyone on their contact list, which also has a Smartphone that they are interested in swapping bodies and would like to offer their body to anyone who is interest for a short period of time.

So you would either instantly sign up, or a friend of yours steals your phone and signs you up.

Now at first your friends think it is weird or some kind of joke but they quickly discover it is real and they can now pick a set time and swap bodies with you, which they take advantage of in order to get you to do things they don’t want to like go to work, do chores, go to the dentist, or just to mess with you by swapping you into awkward situations.

I’m not going to worry about rules this time so just have fun with it, though I reserve the right to delete anything that I believe to be inappropriate or a pointless filler.

Enjoy :)
